reviews.sentence: Good business hotel. A good if not spectacular business hotel. Staff always friendly Hotel lobby bright and cheerful. Place is let down by dated and dark decor in rooms although they are comfortable and quiet. No availability of soft drinks in the fridge emptyminibar. Shuttle service is excellent and drivers always try to help. Restaurant service is good though food is pretty average. Room service menu is very Limited and has not changed in a while. Overall a decent place to stay but it is not spectacular.

A very nice hotel except for the location. We spent two nights at this hotel and found the sleeping quality to be excellent. The front desk was extremely friendly and helpful. The bedding was first rate however the pull out sofa was lacking in linens. This was corrected on our second night. The bathroom was small but adequate. Our room overlooked the freeway but this did not cause any noise problems. My biggest complaint would be the location is not really close to anything except for corporate offices. We did not try their food.
Rooms are beautiful and are a great price.

Overview of Hyat Regency Derfield. Beautiful hotel nice spacious lobby. Room suite is also very spacious and well equipped with amenities. Impressive Business Center computers programmed with easy access to all Airlines for check in. Fully equipped with Printers stationaries etc. Loved the water provided to all guest at the lobby infused with pineapple. Thank you for the complimentary shuttle to nearby places. Will definitely stay at this Hyat for all future visits to Evanston.

Nice facility geared toward business customers. Very attractive facility with upscale ambience at a reasonable rate. Some features were missing from the family experience clearly designed to increase your expense account atop the affordable rate. No microwave in the room no Comcast Sports on TV hoping you had head down to the bar and spend a small fortune16 for a domestic beer and a glass of wine without tip is craziness no free breakfast available and I have no recollection of a free WiFi code. Even every 5th entry on the TV guide was a pay movie. Otherwise enjoyed our stay a great deal but provide the basics we expect for family travel. Staff was very professional ample parking amenities easy to locate thanks.

Family Getaway. Driving from Chicago to Wisconsin I would always see this nice looking hotel to the right. I finally booked a room last Sunday for 1 night. I was really hoping it had an outdoor pool but they only had indoor with a hot tub but they both turned out to be great because it was overcast anyways. This place is really nice only 15 minute ride from city but its on the North Shore. Huge free parking lot. When we walked into lobby we were impressed. Beautiful huge with plenty of seating. Angel check us in he was very nice. Our room was bigger than I expected almost like a 1 bedroom condo. After hanging at uncrowded pool I wanted to try the great looking lobby bar but I think they close a little early on Sundays no problem I just got a beer from my room and went back to enjoy the lobby they had a few big screen tvs. 1 thing about this hotel they have the best AC I have ever experienced in a lobby and hallways. That s the way I like it but my wife joked she felt like she was in a MEAT LOCKER and she forgot her PARKA. Ca nt please everyone. My whole family loved this place and we are returning this week because its so close.

A great place to stay for a holiday weekend. I stayed at the Hyat again this Thanksgiving. Maybe the fifth year I have done so at the holiday as family lives nearby. The rates are very reasonable given the quality of the hotel. I guess that since there is no business demand the room prices drop considerably but the hotel and its amenities remain the same. One tip. I made my reservation at least a month before arrival. About a week before check in I chrcked the Hyat site and found the price had gone down something like 10 a night. I modified the reservation and got the lower price.
Clean comfortable quiet. Starbucks on premises seldom open.
Stayed in the presidential suite. Wonderful stay as well as the team they have there is phenomenal.
Girls shopping trip. Very nice property. Clean quiet spacious rooms. Enjoyable stay for a holiday shopping trip in the area. Several nearby options for outlet shopping and regular retail also.

Room lay out was not very helpful. I needed to obtain help from the guest internet help desk. Since the only phone was on the night stand next to the bed I needed to work with the technician on the bed. Also for someone in from another time zone it was not helpful to have the only clock in the room be on the bathroom mirror. There is no alarm clock or way to se what time it is except in the bathroom.

NO HOT WATER to shower. Shuttle was unavailable on FRIDAY and SATURDAY night as early as 7 pm. We had to use Uber on 4 different occasions and had to incur an extra 100 or so because of the inability to use Hotels shuttle that was advertised as a perk of staying there. It was horrible. would not stay there even if was free. That bad.

Great place to stay. Clean rooms awesome size TV helpful staff. I needed toothpaste they provided this at no cost. did not know breakfast was provided till i was checking out. Would have been good to know this at the check in.
